name: Fallace
description:
Hello chronicler!

This is the game about surviving from the falling objects and you aren't allowed to fall down as well.

The challenge is 1 day, but eventually It takes a week or so to make this game. The code are jumbled, so it's nearly impossible to expand further. And thus, here we got 3 stages for you to beat.

Are you up for the challenge?

If you have played it, tell us what you think!
Enjoy!
